name: Witch
text: The monsters have gotten too many. People in the vilage are dying...

name: Witch
text: They killed a boy... he was only 5... all they were able to find of him was his bracelet...

name: Witch
text: We must go into the forest to combat them... You must go while I plan..

name: Witch
text: Go into the deep forest, make sure they are all dead..

name: Witch
text: Also look for a tree sapling and kill it, I think it's aggravating the magic.
